name.title: Directory name
name.description: Name of the directory to create.

parent_id.title: Parent directory ID
parent_id.description: ID of the parent directory. Starts with `dir_`.

path.title: Directory path
path.description: Path to create the directory in, relative to the root directory. If the path does not exist, it will be created. Includes name, e.g. `path/to/directory`.
